entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Flurries beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Amount 5 cm in snow squalls. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023
